title: Add missing lint script to package.json
description: ESLint config exists but no 'lint' script in package.json. Should add: "lint": "eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx"

title: Replace relative imports with path aliases
description: Many files use relative imports like '../../types/contracts.generated' when tsconfig paths are configured. Should use '@types/contracts.generated' instead.

title: Enable exactOptionalPropertyTypes in tsconfig
description: Currently set to false. Enabling would provide stricter type safety for optional properties.

title: Enable noUncheckedIndexedAccess in tsconfig
description: Currently disabled with TODO comment. Enabling prevents undefined access bugs on array/object indexing.
blockedBy: May require fixing existing code that assumes indexed access is safe
